title: Drawing, "Donkeys", November 3, 1843
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at bottom left:  with Brown and wife and C; and again at bottom right: nov. 3d / 43 / wet and hungry/ 10 M from Rome.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of a winding road in hilly country with a tower rising in the right central distance and a group of buildings in the further left distance.
Verso: A donkey is shown from behind at center, with parts of others shown at right.  At left, vertically, and in opposite direction respectively: three lower parts of legs of donkeys.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Donkeys", November 3, 1843.
November 3, 1843. Graphite on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-39.
